scriptsComments.test:login-page: Run Playwright tests for the login page, located in src/tests/login-page
scriptsComments.test:user-creator: Run Playwright tests for the user creation page, located in src/tests/user-creator
scriptsComments.test:user-table: Run Playwright tests for the user table page, located in src//tests/user-table
scriptsComments.test:all: Run all Playwright tests in the project
scriptsComments.test:format-and-lint: Format the code using Prettier and perform linting
